system.description: As a full action before you do anything other than protocols on your turn, you may make a ranged attack with this weapon at a character within line of sight and Range 20. On hit, they take 3d6 kinetic damage. After firing this weapon, roll a d20: on 10 or less, take 1d3 explosive damage as the rifle blows up and is destroyed.

actions.detail: As a full action before you do anything other than protocols on your turn, you may make a ranged attack with this weapon at a character within line of sight and Range 20. On hit, they take 3d6 kinetic damage. After firing this weapon, roll a d20: on 10 or less, take 1d3 explosive damage as the rifle blows up and is destroyed.
actions.name: Souled Out Class-VI Anti-Materiel Rifle

system.label: Resource
